page.title: 07The Cock Inn Henham
page.content: Mr.Foreman opens the Cock Inn public house from 11,00 am to 2.30 pm ;in the evening 6.00-10.30 pm.The Cock is 300 years old and has been rented by Mr.Foreman for 7.5 years. The public house is owned by Benskins in Watford. Before coming to The Cock, Mr. Foreman was a telephone engineer.The most popu lar food is scampi and chips and chick en and chips.The most popular drink is a pint of bitter.Saturday is the day t hat most money is taken.Monday is the day that least money is taken.Lunch hour is busiest time especially at weekends.The Cock is made of timber frames and lanam plaster.Mr. Foreman told us that he enjoys his job.10 peop le work in The Cock.Summer and winter are the busiest seasons.In May 1985 these are sold in a week bottles of wine=75,pints of beer= 720 cigarettes =100,Crisps=40packets.
